10/10, best game I have ever bought and got it for around $4 as a deal with portal 1 on a steam sale, best game buy ever, wish I could start the story all over again.

This is my favorite puzzle game, and it's something I play quite often! I think it lives up to the original Portal extremely well. The story is fun, and we have to admit, GlaDOS had got some good singing. The testing is just as fun, even if the cake WAS a lie, and I've learned many valuable lessons:
1. Dancing is NOT science
2. That I'm a horrible person
3. That my fashion sense if frowned upon by someone with a medical degree. In fashion! From France!
4. Rockets are the way to go.
wish there were more softlocks so I had a good reason for my leprosy but overall its a good game

Rebeating this game for the third time. Maybe the best game I've ever played (at least in the single player topic). The jokes are perfect, so is the ambience. Level design is really really good (except in the old labs part), and the lore is amazing, specially considering the backstory. I wish there were an sequel to this

Its very fun. It's a great puzzle game and really makes your brain think. It's a lot longer than the first one named portal which is also very good. They both have amazing stories and after playing the first one they took the same mechanics and improved them even more in the second one. Also when they introduced new things in the game they weren't overwhelming and they are introduced very well.
